title: Functional Components
subject: React
theory:
## The Modern Standard Functional components are just JavaScript functions. Since React 16.8 (Hooks), they can do everything class components could do, but with less code. ### Definition `function MyComponent() { return
...
}` ### Arrow Function Syntax `const MyComponent = () => { return
...
}`

interview_questions.question: Why create Functional Components over Class components?
interview_questions.answer: They are easier to read, test, and have less boilerplate. They also avoid the confusion of the `this` keyword in JS.

summary: Functional components are the primary way to write React today.
